FOOTER.DIRECCION: Cerro El Plomo 5630, Office 1602, Las Condes, Chile

HOME.PARRAFO_1: China Railway Construction Corporation (International) Limited (CRCCI), a 100% subsidiary of China Railway Construction Corporation Limited (CRCC), was established in September 2012 and is headquartered in Haidian District, Beijing, with a registered capital of RMB 3.0125 billion. Since its inception, CRCCI has aligned with China‚Äôs Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), expanding its presence to over 50 countries across the Asia-Pacific, Eurasia, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. Focusing on key markets‚ÄîAlgeria, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Hong Kong, Chile, and the Caribbean‚Äîit has delivered landmark projects such as the Lusail Stadium (main venue of the Qatar World Cup), the Bejaia‚ÄìAlgeria Highway, the Mecca Metro (Al Mashaaer Line), the Talca‚ÄìChill√°n segment of Route 5 in Chile, and the Arima General Hospital in Trinidad and Tobago.
HOME.PARRAFO_2: As part of the CRCC Group‚Äîone of the world‚Äôs largest construction companies (ranked 39th on the Fortune Global 500 list in 2022)‚ÄîCRCCI offers comprehensive services including transportation, civil works, design, consulting, real estate development, equipment manufacturing, material supply, logistics, and healthcare. Its excellence has been recognized with awards such as the Luban Prize, the Zhan Tianyou Prize, and the National Quality Engineering Gold Award, strengthening its global reputation.
HOME.PARRAFO_3: In Chile, CRCCI is undertaking major projects in healthcare and mobility: the construction and expansion of regional hospitals, the extension of Santiago Metro lines, commuter train projects to improve intercity connections, and the development of key highways that optimize freight and passenger flow.
HOME.PARRAFO_4: With the core value of ‚ÄúAdvancing Together,‚Äù we continue to build strong partnerships with governments, communities, and clients to deliver sustainable, world-class solutions.

HOME.SERVICIOS_CONTENIDO: At CRCCI, we provide comprehensive, tailored solutions for the management of hospital infrastructure. With a focus on excellence and innovation, our services are designed to ensure that every project meets the highest standards of quality, safety, and efficiency.
HOME.SERVICIO_EQP: Procurement, Replacement and Maintenance of Medical Equipment and Clinical Furniture
